review:
She is the most humble and dedicated doctor we ve ever came across.
We went to her for vaccination however she advised us to not get all the 3 vaccines in one shot and rather break it up for two times and that too only in single charge of consultation.
She is very friendly and giving clear explanations of vaccines  clarifying the all doubts. Hospital was very hygiene and staff was so clear responding.

very humble person.She actually guided us in a proper way and given alternative solution too .We look forward to visit her again.And liked cleanliness of Rainbow child Hospital.They have feeding room too .No hassle for baby and mother .
